author: Martha Cheng
title: 3 Perfect Days on Kauai: The Quintessential Hawaiian Island - WSJ
text: Chances are, when you picture “Hawaii” and the standard array of clichés crowds your mind’s eye—rain forests, waterfalls, blinding white-sand beaches—you are thinking of Kauai, the lushest and oldest of the main Hawaiian islands. Predictably enough, Hollywood chose Kauai as the backdrop for “Jurassic World” and the coming “Jungle Cruise,”... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
